page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: The area consists of three villages, {Mastin Moor,Barlborough and Renishaw surrounded by open farmland.The farmland is mainly grassland although a few fields are cultivated.Of the three villages Mastin Moor and Renishaw are similar being mainly just large housing estates while Barlborough has a great variety of housing from different periods of its long history. All three villages have their roots in the mining industry although Barlborough's go much furher back, as far as the last Domesday Book which has an entry for Barlborough.
